title.rendered: Colorado Rafting Trips and Outdoor Adventures – AVA

content.rendered:
Arkansas Valley Adventures offer the best Colorado whitewater rafting trips in the state, led by highly-skilled rafting guides who will ensure your Colorado rafting trips are the best you’ve ever experienced! Other AVA Colorado outdoor adventures include zip line tours, rock climbing, horseback riding and fishing trips (just to name a few), but if you’re looking for a wide variety of whitewater rafting adventures, you have come to the right place. Here is a list of AVA’s most popular whitewater rafting trip; simply click on the link for more details about each of the trips:

  • Arkansas River
  • Clear Creek
  • Colorado River
  • Dolores River

AVA offers Colorado rafting trips for all ages and skill levels, and trips range from 1/3 of a day to a 10-day long trip. As you know, whitewater rapids are based on a classification system of I-VI; AVA offers whitewater rafting adventures on smooth, easy whitewater (Classes I and II) all the way up to Class VI rapids for the professional rafter only.

Please read “How to Choose the Right Rafting Trip” to see detailed descriptions about the rapids classification system, so you will know what level would be best for you. Our experienced rafting guides will also be able to advise you which trip would best fit your skill level. We also have a Whitewater Rapids Classification Scale page that provides additional information about the rapids classification system.

Why Choose AVA?

First and foremost, your safety is our number one priority. We offer trips at affordable prices that include a wetsuit, splash jacket, helmet, life jacket and paddle. We have multiple outposts and pick-up locations throughout Central Colorado and pride ourselves on providing our guests exemplary service. Lunch is provided on day-long trips, and log cabins and camping areas are available on site. Our guides go through the longest training program in the state, and they work very hard to make sure your trip is one you’ll never forget. Photos of your Colorado outdoor adventures are available after your trip, and our staff also provides information about the area in general such as lodging and travel information. We only offer top-quality equipment to all of our guests, such as Lotus lifejackets, which are said to be the most comfortable jackets on the market today. To sum it all up—Arkansas Valley Adventures is your Colorado rafting trip headquarters.

Arkansas Valley Adventures offer the best Colorado whitewater rafting trips in the state, led by highly-skilled rafting guides who will ensure your Colorado rafting trips are the best you’ve ever experienced! Other AVA Colorado outdoor adventures include zip line tours, rock climbing, horseback riding and fishing trips (just to name a few), but if you’re looking for a wide variety of whitewater rafting adventures, you have come to the right place. Here is a list of AVA’s most popular whitewater rafting trip; simply click on the link for more details about each of the trips.
